did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Universalist Society of Auburn records, 1833-1953.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Volumes containing meeting minutes (1833-1837), constitution, membership lists (1830-1897); confession of faith adopted 1847, list of members (1847-1867), minutes of board meetings, accounts of special services and meeting minutes (1847-1872); constitution and amendments as of April 1892, with list of members and non-members; a parish and church record book compiled July 1892 with entries up to 1953; and the Evangelical Magazine and Gospel Advocate, Vol. III, 1836.
